backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing ratings, user profiles, aliases, and comments with access control and helper comparison modules.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs for compliance tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions providing full light/dark color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the app root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app router configuring all page routes with RootLayout and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AboutVisionSecti: Marketing section contrasting traditional AI vs Forge with outcome‑focused feature lists and styled layout.
frontend/src/components/ActivityFeed.tsx: Displays feed items over time with optional motion reduction and rare message variants, announcing updates and calling onComplete when finished.
frontend/src/components/AgentCard.tsx: Shows a static card describing the Watcher agent with icon, reputation, and acceptance message.
frontend/src/components/AgentSelfOnboard: Renders documentation cards describing the agent self‑onboarding contract and capability declaration schema with embedded JSON examples.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatus.tsx: Manages II authentication UI, login/logout actions, and triggers profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/components/CommentsFeedback: Provides a comments UI with posting, listing, and upvoting tied to page context and user identity.
frontend/src/components/CtaBackButton.ts: A simple button that navigates browser history backward.
frontend/src/components/DevelopersSectio: Displays a developer‑focused section describing agent deployment and gating actions behind authentication.
frontend/src/components/ExecutionPanel.t: Controls phased demo execution flow, managing system messages, agent discovery, and completion state transitions.
frontend/src/components/FooterNote.tsx: Renders multi-column footer with navigation links and branding icons.
frontend/src/components/ForgeBrandMark.t: Displays the Forge AI text logo with configurable sizing.
frontend/src/components/ForgeQuoteCard.t: Shows an animated quote card highlighting Forge’s vision with decorative icons.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenNavOve: Provides a full-screen navigation menu with focus trapping, ESC handling, and scroll locking.
frontend/src/components/GlobalHeader.tsx: Implements the main site header with scroll-based styling and a hamburger-triggered full-screen menu.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the homepage hero with branding, description, and CTAs that navigate based on user input or last task.
frontend/src/components/HomeSectionIndex: Offers a sticky footer of quick-jump buttons enabling smooth scrolling to key homepage sections.
frontend/src/components/JumpToFooter.tsx: Provides a floating button that scrolls smoothly to a referenced footer element, respecting reduced‑motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/MagicalOnboardin: Renders a selection of survey templates and navigates to the demo lab with a chosen prompt.
frontend/src/components/MarketingSection: Reusable marketing header component displaying a title, optional subtitle, micro‑statement, and children.
frontend/src/components/MarketplaceDisco: Displays marketplace categories and featured templates with mode toggling and navigation to demo workflows.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user for their name and saving the profile via mutation with success and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProgressiveDiscl: Expandable/collapsible section component with animated toggle and content reveal.
frontend/src/components/RatingStars.tsx: Star‑rating component that loads existing ratings, allows authenticated submissions, and shows submission status.
frontend/src/components/ResultReveal.tsx: Animated result display with metadata and a rating component, delaying reveal based on motion preferences.
Interactive timeline showing multi‑year roadmap milestones with selectable year details.
frontend/src/components/RotatingPlacehol: Input component that cycles through preset placeholder texts unless reduced-motion is enabled and triggers submit on Enter.
frontend/src/components/TrustComplianceS: Renders a trust and compliance feature strip with icons and descriptive text about platform security intentions.
frontend/src/components/TrustedMetricsBa: Displays simulated live performance metrics using a custom hook and shows them in styled metric cards.
frontend/src/content/lexicon.ts: Defines shared terminology, preferred verbs, and microstatements for consistent agent-related vocabulary.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAgentFirstMode.ts: Stores and toggles an agent-first UI mode using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthGuard.ts: Provides a helper to require authentication via Internet Identity before performing actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useComments.ts: Hooks for fetching, adding, and upvoting comments through the actor with auth enforcement and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCtaNavigation.ts: Provides navigation helper that marks transitions as CTA-driven for UI back-button logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Updates the document title based on the current route using a predefined route-to-title map.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlatformPerformanc: Generates deterministic time-based simulated platform metrics that update every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting and updates reactively.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, ratings, and last forged task via an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollBehavior.ts: Provides smooth scroll-to-top and element scrolling utilities respecting reduced-motion preferences.
Restores scroll positions on browser navigation using route keys and popstate detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useSectionEntryMotion: IntersectionObserver-based hook that flags when a section enters view, with reduced-motion handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus theme variables, motion tokens, typography, and global scroll behavior rules.
frontend/src/layouts/RootLayout.tsx: App layout with global header/footer, background layers, scroll-to-top logic, and back-button handling.
frontend/src/lib/demo/canonicalWatcherDe: Legacy canonical watcher demo wrapper delegating to template-based demo generation.
frontend/src/lib/demo/executionTemplates: Template-based demo generators producing feed items and result data for research, ops, support, and watcher flows.
frontend/src/lib/demo/promptTemplates.ts: Defines prompt template interfaces and collections for category, featured, and survey-based workflow prompts used in the demo.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for merging class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders a static About page explaining Forge AI, its workflow model, and benefits of running on the Internet Computer.
frontend/src/pages/BuildPage.tsx: Displays a marketing page outlining why and how to build autonomous agents on Forge, with sections for features and onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/DemoLabPage.tsx: Implements the interactive demo lab allowing users to run prompts, select templates, and execute jobs with stateful UI handling.
frontend/src/pages/DevelopersPage.tsx: Shows a developer-focused landing page with introductory text and a DevelopersSection component.
frontend/src/pages/DocsPage.tsx: Provides a documentation overview page describing core concepts like autonomous execution and multi‑agent coordination.
frontend/src/pages/ExplorePage.tsx: Landing-style page showing search, filters, and placeholder featured agents with basic metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ForgeHomePage.tsx: Homepage with animated sections, branding, and CTAs guiding users to explore agents or start building.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with explanations of benefits and upcoming email auth.
frontend/src/pages/marketplace/Capabilit: Explains how agents hire other agents, outlining capabilities, workflows, and examples of autonomous task delegation.
Describes human‑in‑the‑loop controls that let users set approval gates and guardrails for autonomous agents.
Covers long‑running agent workflows, detailing persistent state, scheduling, and examples of extended autonomous tasks.
React page describing multi-agent collaboration with explanations, key capabilities, and example use cases.
React page outlining task‑driven agents with definitions, capabilities, and example workflows.
frontend/src/pages/MarketplacePage.tsx: Explains how the agent marketplace works through four core actions: discover, deploy, compose, and monetize.
frontend/src/pages/PlaybooksPage.tsx: Playbooks overview page describing human and machine job request formats with examples and structured specs.
frontend/src/pages/RoadmapPage.tsx: Roadmap timeline page with feedback section allowing users to comment or contact via email.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Renders the support page with contact info, donation address copying, and explanations of ICP and ckBTC along with a feedback component.
frontend/src/pages/VisionPage.tsx: Displays the Vision page describing Forge’s AI economy narrative, autonomous agent workflows, and lifecycle concepts.
frontend/src/utils/jobId.ts: Provides functions to generate unique jobIds and validate their format.
frontend/src/utils/rareVariants.ts: Implements deterministic rare text variants based on jobId plus predefined agency variant sets.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utility for formatting UTC timestamps in short and long forms.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, spacing, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing current version, narrative direction, features, and requirements mapping.
